answers.answer: I would call your dr, your blood pressure could be up and that can be risky.
Thanks, I'll probably be calling the hospital. I don't have a specific doctor set & the clinic is closed by now..
You need to get looked at. Ÿou might have preeclampsia. That is what my obgyn is watching me for right now. I was told if I started to get symptoms like yours to go to the hospital.

question: I've been having a strong headache today, I can well say this is a migraine now.. Also, my body had been sweating excessively & I'm feeling very sick to my stomach. I took a two hour nap in attempts to get this to go away, but I only woke up feeling worse. I'm due in two days, anyone have any ideas what could be going on?
title: should I worry?
